room_title: Escape room "CSI: Orland Park" by Psych Escape Room in Chicago
room_description:
Can you gather clues from the crime scene and crack the case? A robbery at a popular night club owned by a mafia kingpin has gone terribly wrong, leaving one of the perpetrators dead while another got away.

Your team of Crime Scene Investigators must scour through the evidence to identify the second shooter.

You have 60 minutes to figure this out before the gunman flees and the chances of the cops catching him will be nearly impossible. Do you have the investigative skills that it takes to crack the case?
